title: GPT 3 Tutorial | GPT 3 Explained | What Is GPT 3(Generative Pre-trained Transformer 3)? |Simplilearn
excerpt: The field of Artificial Intelligence is rapidly growing, and GPT-3 has been making the news for a few days now. In this video, you will learn about OpenAI's latest language model, i.e., GPT-3. You will understand the specifications of GPT-3 and the different datasets that were used to build this model.
